sources.title: Tobacco Road (1941)
sources.description: Shiftless Jeeter Lester and his family of sharecroppers live in rural Georgia where their ancestors were once wealthy planters. Their slapstick existence is threatened by a bank's plans to take over the land for more profitable farming. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/tobacco-road-1941/

metadata.Plot: Shiftless Jeeter Lester and his family of hillbilly stereotypes live in a rural backwater where their ancestors were once wealthy planters. Their slapstick existence is threatened by a bank's plans to take over the land for more profitable farming; subplots involve the affairs and marriages of son Dude and daughter Ellie May.
metadata.Writer: Nunnally Johnson, Jack Kirkland, Erskine Caldwell
metadata.Actors: Charley Grapewin, Gene Tierney, Marjorie Rambeau
